thread.title: Derailed Amtrak train car transported to Northfield Center
thread.title_full: Derailed Amtrak train car transported to Northfield Center - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Derailed Amtrak train car transported to Northfield Center
text:
NORTHFIELD, Vt. - A big day in Northfield following this week's train derailment.
The 100-ton locomotive was brought out of the woods Saturday, on Bull Run Road. The train was loaded onto a transport and brought to Northfield Center. Officials say the plan is to eventually put the locomotive back on the train tracks in Northfield Center. Officials say it will then be shipped back to a repair shop to be completely refurbished and returned to service. 7 people were injured Monday when the southbound train jumped the tracks after hitting a rockslide.
